scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation

Class TwoColorHeatMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation.TwoColorHeatMap

  • public class TwoColorHeatMap
extends java.lang.Object
    The script to generate a two-color heamap PNG from a matrix of values in tab-delmited/CDT format.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    TwoColorHeatMapCLI, TwoColorHeatMapOutput, TwoColorHeatMapWindow
